name: UPROOTED (NightAnimal)
description:
Adventure, quest-based, 2D game that follows the story of Alex, a recently orphaned child. His parents died in the army while fighting a war to defend their country, and he is all of a sudden alone. His aunt, which lives in another country, hears of the terrible news and offers to adopt Alex. That leads to him moving to her, and start a completely new life in a place where he does not know anyone, the language or traditions of the people. Through interacting with the environment, as well as other characters, he slowly grows “roots” in his adoptive home. Actions such as studying the dictionary through a minigame, solving puzzles or interacting with other characters in the world lead to an increase in the progress bar.

==SPOILER==

 Walkthrough:

- Walk around the map to find the objects to interact with(that have a star above).

- Interact with the newspaper by pressing 'e'. Click on each newspaper piece and rotate with left or right arrow to solve puzzle.

 - Walk in the park and interact with kid. This will increase your familiarity.

- Walk towards the library to start learning words so that you can understand what the kids are saying.

- The library minigame is solved by selecting the letters in the right order so that the words on the left of the screen can be discovered.

- Once completed, walk back to the kid and talk to them.
